message.content:
cs.DC, cs.NI, cs.SY, cs.Distributed, cs.PF 

Reasoning: 
- cs.DC (Distributed, Parallel, and Cluster Computing) is the most likely category as the paper proposes a decentralized auto-scaling algorithm integrated into a P2P architecture. 
- cs.NI (Networking and Internet Architecture) is also likely as the paper discusses the auto-scaling of services over multiple cloud infrastructures, which involves networking and internet architecture. 
- cs.SY (Systems and Control) is another possible category as the paper deals with the dynamic provisioning of virtualized resources to satisfy varying workloads, which can be seen as a control problem. 
- cs.Distributed (Distributed Computing) is a possible category as the paper proposes a decentralized auto-scaling algorithm. 
- cs.PF (Performance) is also a possible category as the paper evaluates the performance of the proposed algorithm in terms of resource utilization and service response times.
